name: rocket-chat
description: Rocket.Chat is a self-hosted team chat platform with channels, direct messages, video calls, and third-party integrations. It supports federation, plugins, and mobile apps.
features: Team messaging: Communicate with colleagues through channels and direct messages.
Video conferencing: Start audio and video calls directly from chat conversations.
File sharing: Upload and share documents, images, and files within conversations.
Federation support: Connect with users on other Rocket.Chat instances using Matrix protocol.
Mobile apps: Access chat from iOS and Android devices with native applications.
Desktop apps: Use dedicated applications for Windows, macOS, and Linux.
Third-party integrations: Connect to GitHub, GitLab, Jira, and hundreds of other services.
Custom bots: Build automated workflows and chatbots using the API.
End-to-end encryption: Protect sensitive conversations with E2E encryption.
Guest access: Invite external users to specific channels without full accounts.
Screen sharing: Share your screen during video calls for presentations or support.
Message threading: Keep conversations organized with threaded replies.
